feed:
tag:<%= @host %>:/dashboard/index/feed <link type="text/html" rel="alternate" href="http://<%= @host_with_port %>"/> <link type="application/atom+xml" rel="self" href="http://<%= @host_with_port %>/dashboard/index/feed.atom"/> Tensaistudio <%= @apps.reverse[0]["pubdate"] %>
<% @apps.sort_by { |k| k["date"] }.reverse.each { |app| %>
tag:<%= @host %>,<%= app.id %> <%= app["pubdate"] %> <%= app["pubdate"] %> <%= app.name %> <%= app.description[0...200] %> <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="<%= app.url %>" title="<%= app.name %>" />
tensaix2j
<% } %>
